QueryDataSource.Name: dtSource
QueryDataSource.Sql: select decode(grouping_id(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name,ce.empl_name),0,mt.card_no,'合计:') 卡号, decode(grouping_id(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name,ce.empl_name),0,mt.name,'/') 姓名, decode(grouping_id(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name,ce.empl_name),0,mt.item_name,'/')项目名称, --mtd.qty 总量, --mtd.free_number 剩余数量, sum(mtd.confirm_number) 执行数量, decode(grouping_id(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name,ce.empl_name),0,to_char(mtd.confirm_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'/') 执行时间, decode(grouping_id(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name,ce.empl_name),0,cd.dept_name,'/') 执行地点, decode(grouping_id(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name,ce.empl_name),0,ce.empl_name,'/') 执行人 from met_tec_terminalapply mt left join met_tec_ta_detail mtd on mt.apply_number=mtd.apply_code left join com_employee ce on ce.empl_code=mtd.confirm_employee left join com_department cd on cd.dept_code=mtd.confirm_department where mtd.status<>2 and mtd.confirm_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 group by rollup(ce.empl_name,(mt.card_no,mt.name,mt.item_name,mtd.confirm_date,cd.dept_name))

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\数据分析\儿保终端确认情况统计设置.xml
